FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice-Activated Medication Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide voice-activated reminders for medication times tailored to Elena's schedule, ensuring simplicity and clarity in instructions.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Virtual Gathering Scheduling
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to schedule virtual gatherings using simple voice commands, streamlining the process for users like Elena who may feel overwhelmed by technology.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Caregiver Dashboard Access
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide a caregiver dashboard that allows caregivers to monitor medication adherence and health readings, ensuring they can offer appropriate support.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Personalized Health Check Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall enable users to set personalized health check reminders, with notifications sent to both the user and designated caregivers to enhance support and adherence.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User-Friendly Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall have a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate for older adults with varying technical abilities, ensuring high usability.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy and Security
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall ensure that all user data, including health information and personal interactions, are stored securely and comply with relevant privacy regulations.
